ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##\s*『点此报错』『加入书签』|({{book.name}})?(正文卷)?(第[零一二三四五六七八九十百千\d]+章\s*)?({{title}}|{{String(title).replace(/\s/g,'')}}|{{String(title).replace(/.*章|\s*/g,'')}})?|ｍ．qItxt．cｏｍ

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
h = url
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));

c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"/user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"/user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.articlename

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content##的小说
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter: .chapter-table a.0@text##正文.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字修Kk].*?[】）\)]
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content##\-.*|\_.*|\s.*

ruleContent.content:
<js>
result=java.ajax("http://"+result.match(/\("\/\/(.*\/data\/.*?)"/)[1])
</js>
@js:
if(result.match(/replace/)){
s=result.match(/replace.*?\{(.*?)\}/)[1].replace(/\\/g,'\\\\')
num=s.split(',').length
for(var i=0;i<num;i++){
	m=s.match(/"(.*?)":"(.*?)"/)
	s=s.replace(/.*?,/,'')
	result=result.replace(new RegExp(m[2],'g'),m[1])
	}
	}else{
result
if(result.match(/txt_call/)){
	result="因网站问题没有正文"
	}
		}
result.replace(/(\\)+n/g,'<\/br>').replace(/.*?:"/,'').replace(/",".*/,'').replace(/"\}.*/,'').replace(/\\/g,'')

ruleSearch.author: a.1@text##的小说
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if(String(result).match(/输入验证码|加载页面中/)){
	var x=baseUrl;
	cookie.removeCookie(x);
	java.startBrowserAwait(x,"验证")
 result
 }
result
</js>
.search-card
ruleSearch.lastChapter: .sc-time span.0@text##正文.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字修Kk].*?[】）\)]
ruleSearch.name: a.0@text##\-.*|\_.*|\s.*

ruleToc.chapterName: text##正文.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字修Kk].*?[】）\)]
